mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (login_id, password, role, username) VALUES (#{loginId}, #{password}, #{role}, #{username})

mapper.select: SELECT u.* FROM users u WHERE login_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{loginId}, '%') AND username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%') AND (branch = #{branch} OR #{branch} IS NULL OR #{branch} = '')
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET username = #{username}, email = #{email}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, branch = #{branch}, role = #{role}, join_date = #{joinDate}, leave_date = #{leaveDate}, login_fail_count = #{loginFailCount}, modified_at = NOW(), modified_by = #{modifiedBy} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
